title: Gary Foley on the set of Dogs in Space in Melbourne
brief_description: The 1980s saw Indigenous activism and Black Power gain prominence in mainstream screen and pop culture, with activist Gary Foley appearing in the cult classic Dogs in Space (1986), which arguably reached a much wider audience than protests.
title_for_label: Gary Foley on the set of Dogs in Space in Melbourne
description: The 1980s saw Indigenous activism and Black Power gain prominence in mainstream screen and pop culture, with activist Gary Foley appearing in the cult classic Dogs in Space (1986) and the family favourite TV show A Country Practice (1989). These pop culture moments, although brief, arguably reached a much wider audience than protests and demonstrate the power of screen culture as a tool of activism, social change and the ongoing struggle for Indigenous Rights.
description_for_label: The 1980s saw Indigenous activism and Black Power gain prominence in mainstream screen and pop culture, with activist Gary Foley appearing in the cult classic Dogs in Space (1986) and the family favourite TV show A Country Practice (1989). These pop culture moments, although brief, arguably reached a much wider audience than protests and demonstrate the power of screen culture as a tool of activism, social change and the ongoing struggle for Indigenous Rights.
